title: Enclave Luxury Condominium for Rent
posting_body: Live like royalty on beautiful grounds, at a convenient location.
★　Huge single level unit (2,200sqft) - no stairs to climb!
★　Sound-proofed concrete building - no noises from neighbors, no complaints!
★　Living room, dining room, sun room, home office area, washer/dryer in unit
★　Lawn & snow plow service, maintenance, water & trash service included
★　5th floor penthouse unit overlooking a lake
★　Facility includes security gate, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness room, barbeque deck, conference room, mini-library
★　Well maintained, quiet grounds surrounded by nature
★　Next to 12 Oaks Mall, 2 minutes to freeway ramp, many restaurants, bars, & grocery stores nearby
Previously has been rented by companies for their overseas executives and other professionals.
